content.body: I'm reading through this now — what's your opinion on also having the number of digits other than the unit?

> <@nicolo-ribaudo:matrix.org> I'm reading through this now — what's your opinion on also having the number of digits other than the unit?

The precision can be encoded into the string, thanks to Eemeli's proposal, so we don't need to explore that space in this one. In the future I'm open to adding more things to the protocol
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @nicolo-ribaudo:matrix.org
I'm reading through this now — what's your opinion on also having the number of digits other than the unit?
The precision can be encoded into the string, thanks to Eemeli's proposal, so we don't need to explore that space in this one. In the future I'm open to adding more things to the protocol
